pages.text: Torpedaspis is a genus of jawless fish from the Silurian period. They had a distinct torpedo like body, hence their naming. They were most likely to be bottom dwelling animals and these fish could grow up around 30cm in length
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
